an7.45:4.1: “Mendicants, there are these seven prerequisites for samādhi.
an7.45:4.3: Right view, right motivation, right speech, right action, right livelihood, right effort, and right mindfulness.
an7.45:4.4: Unification of mind with these seven factors as prerequisites is called noble right samādhi ‘with its vital conditions’ and ‘with its prerequisites’.
